one_reviews_text: Exciting tour through numerous little scenarios. Very cool graphic design! Yes, using both hands for the weapons makes it more difficult, but gives you much more immersion. Outstanding job, letting the gun smoke from the muzzle clutter your own visibility. Not only once I had the feeling to be amidst a "Band of Brothers" or "Saving Private Ryan" scene. I love it when the M1 Garand mag clip "pings" out! Best deal in the last months!

Really enjoying this so far :) just needs to have the gun mechanics tweaked a bit and maybe show the left hand on the gun stock while gripping to add a little more immersion. This title would do really well I think if they can develop it in a quest 2 version as well

what a realy good game saving private ryan type adventure.
had a blast runs smooth good stuff keep up the good work devs
Great game. Needs some bug fixes but other than that runs solid. Would also love to see it on Quest/Quest 2!
Great game but 2 handed weapons are really tough to use
